title: What are some mind blowing facts about the year 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your question is very general. So, I have to give you a general answer. In 2020, you should know to be more happy. You should know that your are important and have a purpose to full fill on this earth. You have been given this time on earth to do something significant. In 2020, you should know that your family should be your priority. They have done a lot for you and now its your time to bring a smile on their face. Spend time with them. Cherish those memories. Build your relationships. Give people a chance. Give a life a chance. In 2020, you should know that you are going to achieve whatever you want. You are going to get whatever you want. It exists already, all you have to do is manifest it to you. And the only way to do is give love. To everyone and everything. Share happiness. Be kind. Make someone happy everyday and see how your life changes. And the most important thing you should know is that you have to be positive all along. No matter the situation. Be patient and know that you will get through this. Hope y answer was helpful. Have a great day and a wonderful year ahead.

Personally for me is to vote Donald out of the white house. For the country it is very important to remember the murder of George Floyd and the thousands of protesters of all colors and especially to the brave youth that protested knowing they could get the virus but still wanted to take a chance to have their voice spoken and to make our country better. I do believe our country will remember this as long as they live. I do hope and pray something will be done to our laws that will not discriminate against who we are. We must remember the thousands of lives that have been lost to the virus. It should be remember to know that we are in a recession that will take many years to get out of. Many jobs that will never recover, This year will be written in history books for the next generation. These 3 things will be remembered.
